page.title: 18LIFE STYLES
page.content: The Island Hotel takes up 10 acres of land.It has special facilities for old people.People sometimes come here when they are newly wed and for holidays.There are no special facilities for children at the moment.They have wedding receptions but there is no entertainment at night. Guests are required to wear a formal dress at dinner and tea,no jeans.The quiet season is expected to be between July and August.Pets are allowed.Not many children stay there.The Hotel is open 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.There isn't a swimming pool yet.It is called Island Hotel because of the island near it.The London suite which is a conference room sits 600 cinema style.The fish farm delivers fish.The Lobsters is the most expensive fish.To stay in the rooms it is Â£32.50 a night
